In England, in the seven days to 22 May, there were 13,259 new confirmed cases (23.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 May, there were 11,861 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 12% (1,398 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 May is 3,904,934 (6,937.5 cases per 100,000 population).
